job description:
Data Scientist-Medical Imaging
If you are a Data Scientist with experience, please read on!
Top Reasons to Work with Us
We offer a rewarding employee experience: innovative culture, professional growth potential, competitive compensation and an exceptional benefits package.

Other extras include:

-Diamond Awards ceremonies (employee awards and recognition)
-Employee Appreciation Day
-Ice cream social
-Holiday events
-Company-wide volunteering events
-Diversity potluck celebration
-Healthy food and wellness initiatives
What You Will Be Doing
- Collaborate with scientists, leadership, government regulatory bodies, vendors, and clinicians to develop standards and scenarios for applying AI to healthcare.

- Apply technical knowledge to guide and support the development of AI standards and requirements.

- Work with various entities in healthcare to understand their needs and how our efforts can best benefit patients.
What You Need for this Position
More Than 5 Years of experience and knowledge of:

- Computer Vision
- C++
- Python
- R
- Tensorflow
- Keras
- Sci-kit
- SQL
What's In It for You
-Defined contribution 403(b)/pension plan
-Generous PTO
-Insurance plans with leading providers
-Flexible spending plan
-Tuition reimbursement
-Wellness reimbursement
-Onsite fitness center
-Training and employee development are very important to us. We offer a tuition reimbursement program as well as various other opportunities to learn, such as seminars, webinars, courses, conferences, free access to LinkedIn Learning , and more.
So, if you are a Data Scientist with experience, please apply today!
-

Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.



CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Your Right to Work In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
